title: 9/27/17 - Christians Beware (David Fench, Dr. Bassem Youssef & Kyle Olson join Glenn)
description:
Witness the birth of a new country...Kurdish independence vote...Christians may up paying the highest price ... Stu's 'white privilege' muscles through again...Racist SAT tests??...What matters most?...the people of Puerto Rico … Meanwhile, everyone...’Congress needs to act now and get rid of the Jones Act’...What is the 'Jones Act'? ...The Jon Stewart of Egypt, Doctor Bassem Youssef (www.ticklinggiants.com) joins the show to crack us up with his perspective on what's going on in the Middle East...The day of reckoning is here ...Bannon and Trump, an 8th-grade romance gone wrong? ...Flashback to 1989: President Ronald Reagan reminds us all what it means to be an American ...Education expert and CEO Kyle Olson (EAGnews.org and LumenNews.com) joins the show to tell us what is lacking in America's education system.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
